sourceOfFunds.purpose: As a first installment of the sanctioned Rs 2,00,000, we received Rs 1,50,000 during 2012-13. The remaining amount was released in 2013-14. As we received the whole amount, so mentioned it in the same year of 2012-13 to avoid any confusion.

Out of the total sanctioned amount of Rs 2,50,000, we received the first installment of Rs 1,87,500 during 2013-14 and the remaining amount in next fiscal. But as we spent the entire Rs 2,50,000 in 2013-14 itself after getting the sanction letter, so we have mentioned it in 2013-14 to avoid any confusion.

Out of the total sanctioned amount of Rs 3,00,000, we received the first installment of Rs 2,25,000 during 2014-15 and the remaining amount in next fiscal. But as we spent the entire Rs 3,00,000 in 2014-15 itself after getting the sanction letter, so we have mentioned it in 2014-15 to avoid any confusion.

Out of the total sanctioned amount of Rs 1,50,000, we received the first installment of Rs 1,12,500 during 2015-16 and the remaining amount in next fiscal. But as we spent the entire Rs 1,50,000 in 2015-16 itself after getting the sanction letter, so we have mentioned it in 2015-16 to avoid any confusion.
In 2016-17, the organisation did not receive any financial support from the government. It carried out its routine theatre activities with the help of its own resources.
NO grants received from the government.

The Drama Festival was smoothly conducted. Although the funds came late, we managed to hold the festival. We received the first installment of the fund. The UC has been made and it will be sent within next few days so that the remaining Rs 25,000 can be released.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Major Activities/Achievements Sankar Madhav Sanskritik Samaj, Jorhat, Assam established on 22nd November 2011, which was affiliated by the Register of societies Govt. of Assam vide their memo no. 14210070/5474 dated 4/11/2015. The organisation is undertaking the programmes for promotion and development of Educational, social, Art & culture, Rural development ,Health, Women and Child welfare and Agriculture. During last 5 years the organisation have done the following activities for promotion and welfare of the society. 1. Workshop on Srimanta Sankardevaâ€™s Ankia Bhaona. 2. Workshop &training on folk dance(Bihu) every year from time to time. 3. Organised workshop on Sattria culture every year in the month of July. In the year 2016 we have executed a 5 days workshop from 27/7/2016 to 31/7/2016 on Ankia Nitya-geet and a demonstration held on 31/7/2016 successfully. 4. The organisation have also stage Srimanta Sankardevaâ€™s Ankia Nat â€œRam Vijoyâ€, â€œRukmini Haranâ€, â€œKeli Gopalâ€ and â€œ Parijat Haranâ€ in various districts of Assam and have able to secure must support and praise from the spectator. Beside this we will also undertake the other activities as mentioned above in near future. In this connection we would like to bring your kind attention that the Cultural Affairs Govt. of Assam Cultural Centre Jorhat have provide a certificate regarding our performance and experience in Sattria Culture since 2011. We also like to mention here that we have a plan to trained up and promote the young children and youth to the Sattria Culture.
